issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: While attempting to delete an account that still has attached resources, detail regarding the resources that were attached was not provided. In fact the ErrorResponse shows the closing tag, but does not contain the opening tag or detail string itself. Here is an example: {code} [root@scale-02-01-01 ~]# euare-accountdel acct-2 euare-accountdel: error (DeleteConflict): Account acct-2 can not be deleted. [root@scale-02-01-01 ~]# euare-accountdel acct-2 --debug 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 DEBUG DeleteAccount parsed arguments: {'dummy': False, 'Recursive': None, 'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': None, 'AccountName': 'acct-2', 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None} 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 INFO Config finding global option default-region 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 INFO Config novalue for default-region 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 INFO Config finding global option timeout 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 WARNING IAM added fake region name undefined-24966 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 DEBUG HmacV4Auth using auth info from environment 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 INFO DeleteAccount parameters: {'Action': 'DeleteAccount', 'Version': '2010-05-08', 'AccountName': 'acct-2'} 2015-08-21 08:17:31,851 DEBUG DeleteAccount sending flattened params as form data 2015-08-21 08:17:31,853 INFO IAM sending request (attempt 1 of 3) 2015-08-21 08:17:31,857 DEBUG HmacV4Auth payload hash: baef61db299ea4529f2911b7010e377559c6ae7f7fcea3a3ee10347d40bdeb89 2015-08-21 08:17:31,857 DEBUG HmacV4Auth scope: 20150821/undefined-24966/iam/aws4_request 2015-08-21 08:17:31,857 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical URI: /services/Euare 2015-08-21 08:17:31,857 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical query: 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical headers: [u'content-length:58', 'content-type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded', 'host:10.112.10.30:8773', 'x-amz-content-sha256:baef61db299ea4529f2911b7010e377559c6ae7f7fcea3a3ee10347d40bdeb89', 'x-amz-date:20150821T151731Z'] 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG HmacV4Auth signed headers: content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical request: u'POST\n/services/Euare\n\ncontent-length:58\ncontent-type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded\nhost:10.112.10.30:8773\nx-amz-content-sha256:baef61db299ea4529f2911b7010e377559c6ae7f7fcea3a3ee10347d40bdeb89\nx-amz-date:20150821T151731Z\n\ncontent-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date\nbaef61db299ea4529f2911b7010e377559c6ae7f7fcea3a3ee10347d40bdeb89' 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG HmacV4Auth string to sign: 'AWS4-HMAC-SHA256\n20150821T151731Z\n20150821/undefined-24966/iam/aws4_request\n488e267754e14538d3a0bc84853f98b170f4813328e90d3f807ff997cb828bd8' 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG HmacV4Auth signature: 4b7de32dc818a0bcd4bd07fcea09799ddd4cb7bdab99f93819bafdeb9535c8c7 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG HmacV4Auth signed headers: content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date 2015-08-21 AWS4-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=AKIAAFDL7EUOXWUXNPPW/20150821/undefined-24966/iam/aws4_request, SignedHeaders=content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date, Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG IAM request header: Host: 10.112.10.30:8773 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG IAM request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.2.1-43-ge439ce8 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-504.3.3.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.3.4 requests/1.1.0 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG IAM request header: X-Amz-Content-SHA256: baef61db299ea4529f2911b7010e377559c6ae7f7fcea3a3ee10347d40bdeb89 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG IAM request header: X-Amz-Date: 20150821T151731Z 2015-08-21 08:17:31,858 DEBUG IAM request data: time: 0.069 seconds 2015-08-21 08:17:31,928 ERROR IAM response status: 409 2015-08-21 08:17:31,929 DEBUG IAM response header: content-length: 263 2015-08-21 08:17:31,929 DEBUG IAM response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 2015-08-21 08:17:31,930 DEBUG DeleteAccount -- response content -- SenderDeleteConflictAccount acct-2 can not be deleted.3aac2521-9081-41b3-8030-1a94576ed813 2015-08-21 08:17:31,930 DEBUG DeleteAccount -- end of response content -- 2015-08-21 08:17:31,931 INFO DeleteAccount result: failure euare-accountdel: error (DeleteConflict): Account acct-2 can not be deleted. Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/euare-accountdel", line 6, in euca2ools.commands.iam.deleteaccount.DeleteAccount.run() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 305, in run cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 302, in run result = cmd.main() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 205, in main response = self.send() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 276, in send return BaseRequest.send(self) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 171, in send return self.handle_server_error(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 158, in send auth=self.auth) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 226, in send_request self.handle_http_error(response) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/iam/__init__.py", line 55, in handle_http_error raise AWSError(response) euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (409, 'Conflict', 'DeleteConflict', 'Account acct-2 can not be deleted.') [root@scale-02-01-01 ~]# euare-accountgetsummary --as-account acct-2 Groups: 0 InstanceProfiles: 0 Roles: 0 ServerCertificates: 0 Users: 1 {code} As you can see, in the ErrorResponse you see the closing tag, but not the opening tag: {code} SenderDeleteConflictAccount acct-2 can not be deleted.3aac2521-9081-41b3-8030-1a94576ed813 {code} This AWS documentation shows that error 409 should provide detailed information: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/APIReference/API_DeleteUser.html
fields.summary: DeleteConflict error response does not contain <Detail><Detail/> information

comments.body:
Account deletion is a eucalyptus specific action and does not relate to any AWS/IAM action. You can find more info on empty XML elements here:

http://www.w3.org/TR/xml11/#dt-empty

It would be good to include some details on what resources prevent the deletion.
